title: MaYi
name: Liu Cheng
summary: My name is Liu Cheng but usually called by 'MaYi'.
Had 6+ years experiences of developing mid to large scale websites, web applications and desktop&mobile applications with latest technologies like React, React Native, Electron, Grails etc.

Currently working as the freelancer and the front end strategy & team leader from the Wiredcraft which is the digital agency located in Shanghai. AndI used to be the full stack developer but focusing on front end development and management right now.
If you wish to find out more about me, you could email me at liucheng@flyingant.me or visit the following links (LinkedIn, GitHub).

contents.title: Wiredcraft
contents.description:
August 2016 – Present , Shanghai, China

My role at Wiredcraft was senior lead frontend development. Managing a team of frontend developers to create solutions for different clients and products. Besides guiding the team, also actively involved in frontend development and worked closely together with clients and other teams such as backend, design, and marketing. Wiredcraft is a digital agency and provides the local solution to companies like Starbucks, Nike, Walmart, Burberry, and Hilton.

contents.title: Apploi
contents.description:
March 2014 - July 2014 , Manhattan, New York City

Apploi was a startup company that focused on job hunting and my project tasks are about web and mobile app development by using HTML5, Backbone, CSS3, Grails, and Objective-C.

contents.title: Breeze Capsule
contents.description:
April 2012 – July 2016 , Wuhan, Hubei, China

During my time at Breeze Capsule, I was hired for the position full stack developer and daily tasks were aimed at creating the frontend visuals, websites, web apps and mobile app using HTML5, React, React Native, Backbone, CSS, SCSS and Java, Grails, Objective-C
